title: Competition & Our Edge
intro: While home healthcare isn't new, the market is either too slow, too expensive, or not designed for immediate needs.

competitors.title: Premium Home Healthcare Services
competitors.focus: Scheduled, long-term elderly care and chronic patient management
competitors.gap: Not built for on-demand care, unaffordable for middle class

competitors.title: Doctor Home Visit Services
competitors.gap: Not scalable - India has severe doctor shortage, making this model unfeasible for widespread immediate care needs

competitors.title: Telemedicine Platforms
competitors.gap: No physical care - can't draw blood, dress wounds, or administer injections

competitors.title: Ambulance Services
competitors.gap: Overkill for minor accidents, wound care, or routine nursing

differentiators.title: Hyperlocal & Fast
differentiators.description: 4-5 km radius = 20-30 min response time (not 24 hours)

differentiators.title: On-Demand + Routine Care
differentiators.description: Immediate medical needs AND scheduled recovery care

differentiators.title: Nurse-First Approach
differentiators.description: Scalable model using nurses/paramedics with doctor teleconsultation backup
